Subject: Re: Lets Get Dangerous !
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

OOC: Yanshosh, would Motormaster's wounds be healed yet? I'm not sure.

BIC:
Motormaster leaps out of the shuttle into nothingness of space, and
manuvers himself around to fire on the attacking ship. He pulls the trigger
twice as he opens his commlink. "You better not leave me out here after the
fight Astroblast. Or I might drift away from earth." He states, more of a
command than a joke.
